### 格式化当前时间函数

1. Format yyyy-mm-dd
```clojure
(format-time-string "%Y-%m-%d")
;; "2022-11-28"
```

2. Unix Time Format(number of seconds since 1970-01-01)
```clojure
(format-time-string "%s")
;; "1669620311"
```

3. Names for Month and Week
```clojure
(format-time-string "%B") ; "November"
(format-time-string "%b") ; "Nov"
(format-time-string "%A") ; "Monday"
(format-time-string "%a") ; "Tue"
```

4. Timezone
```clojure
(format-time-string "%z")
```

### 拼接字符串(concat)

```clojure
(concat "/path/to/root" "cur_dir" "file_name" ".extend")
```

### 打开(创建)当天日期文件

```clojure
(open-file
  (concat "~/org" (format-time-string "%Y-%m-%d") ".org"))
```
